Multi-car qualifying races for the Desert X-Prix event in AlUla have been replaced by single-car time trials on the Saturday.
Each driver pairing will complete one morning run and one afternoon run … [+2184 chars]

articles.title: Detectives find cause of Tiger Woods crash but won't reveal - Daily Mail

articles.description: Mount, 22, has proved himself undroppable by Three Lions boss Gareth Southgate, with the Chelsea star starting an eighth-successive England game for the clash with Poland at Wembley.
